pages.text:
Our staff members have spent many years devoted to pursuing excellence in their field and have attained a certain level of expertise to qualify them as instructors and trainers.
Through extensive training, certification and dedication, our staff has attained mastery in their fields and now enjoy sharing their skill and passing it on to our members. Here are a few of Miami Lakes Golf Club's staff members:
Charles DeLucca III, PGA
John Reed
Tim Sticco
Dave Gergely
Mike Stern
Joey Vega
Jen Lemus
Max Wagenberg
Felicia Leftinger, LPGA
Charles DeLucca III, PGA
General Manager, PGA |
This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.
John Reed
Director of Golf |
This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.
Tim Sticco
Superintendent |
This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.
Originally from Hollywood, Florida, Tim has been with Miami Lakes Golf Club since 2001.  Prior to joining Shula's, Tim worked at the Doral Resort & Spa, Weston Hills Country Club, and Whistling Straits in Kohler, Wisconsin.  He has worked closely with the PGA and LPGA tours for the Doral Ryder Open, Honda Classic, and LPGA Tournament of Champions.  He was instrumental in the renovation of the Great White course at Doral, and construction of the Tour and Player's course at Weston Hills Country Club.
Dave Gergely
Golf Sales Manager |
This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.
Born in Allentown, PA, where he played Baseball, Basketball and Golf, for Louis E. Dieruff High School. Earned A Bachelor of Science Degree in Marketing and Education at Rider University in Lawrenceville, N.J.
Began his career with Miami Lakes Golf Club and The Graham Companies as The Program Director for Miami Lakes Athletic Club in 1982, has also served as The Director of Sports Entertainment at ML Steaks & Sport Restaurant.  During his 30 plus years with Miami Lakes Golf Club, Dave has always enjoyed  golf and since 2012, in his current position of Golf Sales Manager,  He specializes in Corporate Groups, Charity, Groups and anyone interested in playing golf at Miami Lakes Golf Club.
Mike Stern
Head Golf Professional |
This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.

If golf is your passion, then we invite you to explore our membership opportunities at Miami Lakes Golf Club. We offer a spectacular golf experience at an unbeatable value. Our golf memberships include first-rate amenities not available to the general public. Amenities include invitations to member-only tournaments, member trips, member socials, private practice areas, discounts at ML Steaks + Sports, and advanced starting times.
Enjoy the privileges of membership while playing at Miami Lakes Golf Club. Miami Lakes Golf Club has a variety of golf memberships available for every golfer.
For additional information about pricing and our application process, please fill out this form or call a member of our professional staff at
305-820-8088
*8097. We look forward to hearing from you.
